page.title: 06Religion
page.content: Although there is only one church included in the given block,The Bethel United Reform Church (036300482),there are seven just outside. 1 St Oswald's Church (C.E.) 03590484 2 St Bernard's Church (R.C.) 03530484 3 St John's Church (C.E.) 04030486 4 St William's Church (R.C.) 04140478 5 Methodist Church,Pilling 04010482 6 Elim Pentecostal Church 03530486 7 Methodist Church,Knott-End 03530485 There seems to be a greater proportion of the population in our block attending church regularly than in the country as a whole,perhaps this is because of the high proportion of retired people in our block.The farmers seem to belong to the Church of England.The churches are great centres for clubs and societies and their halls provides many of the locations for meetings of other groups
